name: Nightmare on Azathoth
description: Nightmare on Azathoth is a dark game, in which you might not want to find the truth. Manage your base, scavenge, collect memory fragments, and collect resources to power up your spaceship to escape this planet. Death only brings an endless time loop, that restarts everything on the 4th day.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: i3 Core Processor 2.6 ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GT 335m Storage: 800 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: i5 Core processor 2.6 ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1 Gig Discrete Gpu Storage: 800 MB available space
